content:
That's fantastic! Consistency is key when it comes to language learning, and having a regular language exchange schedule can really help you make progress.

It's great to hear that you've been using an app to connect with a language exchange partner, and that it's been helping you improve your speaking skills. Consistency is crucial for building momentum and confidence in language learning.

Increasing the frequency of your sessions is a great goal! As you get more comfortable with your language exchange partner, you can try to gradually increase the frequency or duration of your sessions. This will help you to:

* Improve your speaking fluency and accuracy
* Build a stronger connection with your language exchange partner
* Stay motivated and engaged in your language learning journey

Remember to communicate with your language exchange partner about your goals and availability, and make sure you're both on the same page. It's essential to find a schedule that works for both of you, so you can continue to make progress and enjoy the language exchange experience.

Keep up the great work, and I wish you all the best in your language learning journey!
